Fixed Sets.Player's Handbook Heroes: This series consisted of twelve booster packs of non-random miniatures, all sculpted by Peter Lee, three a piece in transparent packaging along with an accompanying power card. The miniatures represented various character races and classes that were available in the 4{{th}} edition of Dungeons & Dragons, derived from options available in the ''[[Player's Handbook 4th edition|Player's Handbook]]'' and ''[[Player's Handbook 2]]'', as well as some options from the ''[[Forgotten Realms Player's Guide]]'' and the ''[[w:c:eberron:Eberron Player's Guide|Eberron Player's Guide]]''.
